  • about

I'm Jesse. I'm a front end developer and visual designer at IBM Design and a design mentor at Bloc. I graduated from The Iron Yard's UI design program and have a degree in Communication Studies.

Design and front end development are a perfect outlet for my analytical brain and love of making and communication. I enjoy thinking critically & creatively about how to best solve problems for users and designing, testing, and coding the solutions.

When not in front of the computer, you can find me crafting, practicing the banjo, reading, hiking, or eating tacos.

"I want to be around people that do things. I don't want to be around people any more that judge or talk about what people do. I want to be around people who dream, and support, and do things." —Amy Poehler
